summary: Replaces default Nirnroot sound with windchime sound.
descriptionHtml:
The default Nirnroot sound always annoyed me tremendously in my playthroughs.  I wanted to replace the sound with something more pleasing.

This mod simply places a windchimes wav file in your sound directory that overrides the default Nirnroot sound.

Installation:
Copy "sound" folder into your Skyrim Data folder.

Uninstallation:
Delete Data/sound/fx/itm/ingredient/itm_nirnroot_lp.wav

Credits:
I found the windchime sound on Youtube.  You can listen to it here:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/HOfRnzRi89c

In the author's own words:
"Published on Aug 15, 2013
Made for a project, thought I may as well upload it.
Download here- http://www.mediafire.com/?61k1ckd8e6qeh48
If you use it for anything, please give me credit (http://www.sidneyturner.com/)"
author: MacleanArgent
